features: [Patented Auto-Alignment Tech] Perfect installation within 30 seconds! The screen protector is embedded in a plastic frame that fits perfectly over your phone. Set the frame on your phone, swipe down the middle, and done! Watch our Installation Video to see how easy it is to use our Innovative OneTouch Auto-Alignment Screen Protector.

[Screen Protector Compatible with iphone 14 2022 6.1"/iPhone 13 / iPhone 13 Pro 6.1"] Specially designed ONLY for the 6.1 inch models of iPhone 14 /iPhone 13 /13 Pro. Not compatible with any other iPhone models.
[2 Pack] iPhone 14 6.1"/13 / 13 Pro Screen Protectors, two auto alignment tool kits (screen protectors come pre-installed in the auto alignment tool) and two installation accessory kits.
[Screen Protection] 0.33mm thick premium tempered glass offers full coverage, scratch resistance, and drop protection for your iPhone 14 6.1"/iPhone 13 / iPhone 13 Pro (6.1'')

[Anti-Fingerprint] amFilm tempered glass screen protector for iPhone 14/iPhone 13 / iPhone 13 Pro is finished with oleophobic coating to reduce fingerprints and provide ultra-clear high definition with 99.9% transparency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest Install Ever!!
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying that I have used dozens of different brands of screen protectors on many models of phones over the years (mostly iPhones but a few androids) as I have involuntarily muscle spasms/twitching and neuropathy in my hands and arms so I drop my phone frequently. I also have 2 little boys so I need my phone well protected at all times. I can honestly say i have never had an easier more seamless experience installing a screen protector than I did with this amFilm one touch tempered glass screen protector. I simply scanned the QR code on the instructions which simultaneously let me register the product and showed a simple video demonstrating the installation process. This was also the only kit that came with both a full screen sized dust removal sticker as well as the smaller individual dust removal stickers that most kits come with. That combined with the perfectly fitted plastic install guide made for a seamless experience with absolutely zero air bubbles or dust specks between the phone screen and the screen protector. In the video it does show you what to do if you happen to get an air bubble but that was unnecessary for me. I actually had to double check to make sure the screen protector was actually on my phone because it applied so flawlessly! I like the fact that it comes with 2 sets of screen protectors and 2 sets of installation kits so you don’t have to reuse any of the pieces including the outer tray for the second protector if you happen to crack or damage the first one. I cant speak to durability yet but I can say that with my previous screen protector I was starting to have a lot of difficulty clicking on the exact part of the screen I was aiming for. I actually thought I was going to have to replace my phone because I was having so many issues. After applying the techmate amFilm screen protector my phone seems brand new again! No typing the wrong letters or having difficulty scrolling. It also seems to be quite fingerprint and smudge resistant so far. I will update my review if anything changes but as of now I would never purchase a different brand again. This review is my 100% honest opinion as a consumer. I paid full price for this product and did not receive any kind of free gift or discount in exchange for my review. I’m simply sharing my experience as a consumer who counts on accurate product reviews when deciding what to purchase. In fact this was one of the few products on Amazon that didn’t specifically request a written review in the packaging. Their warranty says if you’re not 100% satisfied to contact them and they make it right. Clearly they are confident in their product and I agree it’s an excellent screen protector. I am much more satisfied with the Amwell glass screen protector by techmate than I was with other screen protectors that cost 3Xs as much! I hope this review was helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing price and value
reviews.reviewText: The amFilm OneTouch screen protector is a great option for those looking for a durable and easy-to-install screen protector for their iPhone 14 6.1"/iPhone 13/iPhone 13 Pro 6.1". The screen protector is made of tempered glass, which is very resistant to scratches and cracks. It also has an oleophobic coating that helps to reduce fingerprints and smudges.The OneTouch screen protector comes with an easy-to-use installation kit that makes it very easy to get a bubble-free installation. The kit includes a plastic frame that fits over the phone, and a squeegee that is used to remove any air bubbles.I have been using the amFilm OneTouch screen protector for a few weeks now, and I am very happy with it. The screen protector is very clear and responsive, and it has done a great job of protecting my phone screen from scratches and bumps. I would definitely recommend this screen protector to anyone looking for a durable and easy-to-install screen protector for their iPhone 14 6.1"/iPhone 13/iPhone 13 Pro 6.1".Here are some of the pros and cons of the amFilm OneTouch screen protector:Pros:Durable tempered glass constructionEasy-to-use installation kitOleophobic coating resists fingerprints and smudgesCrystal clear screenCase friendlyCons:Can be a bit difficult to remove if you need toNot as scratch-resistant as some other screen protectorsOverall, I think the amFilm OneTouch screen protector is a great option for those looking for a durable and easy-to-install screen protector for their iPhone 14 6.1"/iPhone 13/iPhone 13 Pro 6.1". It is clear, responsive, and does a great job of protecting the phone screen from scratches and bumps. I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to install
reviews.reviewText: I've never installed a screen protector so easily. Just follow the instructions and it's on PERFECTLY. No air bubbles, no gaps, no problems. And it comes with a 30-day money back guarantee and a lifetime warranty.I bought this for my work phone and purchased an extra pack to share with my coworkers.Thank you. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and Easy
reviews.reviewText: Got it on the first try. Looks and feels great. Nice and straight and clear without blemishes, looks like there is none there. Love the fact that my screen is protected without looking like it has something sticking to it like in the old days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is easy to install and took less than a minute. There are completely no bubbles, which I why I was looking for this product. However, the screen protector is not as durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used screen protectors from a bunch of different brands and this was by far the easiest and best install yet. I have two phones and both installs were flawless.It comes with a dust removal sticker that covers the entire screen at once which gives you a dust free install every time. The installation tray fits snug and aligns perfectly unlike the worthless little plastic border aligners that are always slightly off.Even if they end up breaking easily, they are very affordable so replacing won’t be a problem. Will definitely be ordering from AmFilm every time.
Me gusto fácil de instalar y no se quedan tanto las huellas en el cristal muy satisfecha

reviews.reviewTitle: Super easy install and works with Otterbox Defender Case!
reviews.reviewText: Worked well. Easy to install with no dust inclusion. Perfect coverage on Iphone 14 with a Otterbox Defender case. Cheap and easy what more could you ask for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Possibly the best screens protectors ever !
reviews.reviewText: These are possibly the best screen protectors that I have ever bought.A very bold claim, yet the included applicator frame made installation a quick, easy, and more importantly, an air bubble free, job.
Facilísimo de poner, y queda sin ninguna burbuja
Fitting arrangement sent in the package is great. The application instruction is very clear. Two screenguards in Rs 899/- is a good deal. We used two screen guards in two iphones.
